name: Listened to Season opener recap + look-ahead to Texas A&M

content.html:
Week 1 recap and an early look at Texas A&M - Carlos Ledo of the MIA All-Day podcast joins Manny to review snap counts and the good and the bad from Miami’s season-opening win over Bethune-Cookman. The guys look at how Week 1 went for Miami’s future opponents and answer mailbag questions. The Athletic’s Sam Khan Jr. then join Manny to provide an early look at sixth-ranked Texas A&M. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Wide Right: A show about the Miami Hurricanes
